title: dVRK teleop ecm 2.0
description: Configuration file format for the dVRK .  See [dVRK wiki](https://github.com/jhu-dVRK/sawIntuitiveResearchKit/wiki).  This format is used by the application `sawIntuitiveResearchKitQtConsoleJSON` and the ROS application `dvrk_robot dvrk_console_json`

rotation.description: [Deprecated] Make sure your arms are properly aligned using their "base-frame"
